Citation_Information.description: Cassini ISS $narrow_or_wide=('narrow' if INSTRUMENT_ID == 'ISSNA' else 'wide')$-angle camera image taken at $DATETIME(START_TIME)$.

Modification_Detail.description: Initial PDS4 Version. Migrated from the PDS3 data product.

Product_Observational.Observation_Area:
This product was migrated from the original PDS3 product. The contents of the data file were reorganized in order to make the file PDS4 compliant. Values for attributes in this label are based on the corresponding values in the PDS3 label.

Source_Product_External.description: This refers to the original PDS3 version of this product. The form of the reference is dataset_id:product_id.
